targets.query:
from(bucket: "simba_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ValveServos")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valve_feed_position")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "simba_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ValveServos")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valve_vent_position")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "simba_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TankingCommands")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "main_valve")

  |> yield(name: "last")
